topic.title: DITA Map to PDF - CSS WYSIWYG Customization

body.p: comes bundled with the DITA Open Toolkit that provides a mechanism for converting DITA maps to PDF output. includes a built-in DITA Map to PDF - CSS WYSIWYG transformation scenario that convert DITA maps to PDF using a CSS-based processing engine.

DITA to PDF output can be customized in several ways:
Creating a DITA Open Toolkit plugin that adds extensions to the PDF output. More details can be found in the DITA Open Toolkit Documentation.
